title: Photo-accelerated oxidation of spiro-OMeTAD for efficient carbon-based perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,1054-1061
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00029C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
S. N. Vijayaraghavan, Kausar Khawaja, Jacob Wall, Wenjun Xiang, Feng Yan
Photo-accelerated oxidization enables fast production of a Spiro-OMeTAD hole transport layer in perovskite solar cells. This strategy delivers high power conversion efficiency and overcomes barriers to mass manufacturing.
